page.title: 06Food choices in Ipplepen.
page.content: We each planned our favourite menu then we voted to find which foods were most popular. These are the results: { Breakfast:}Cereals with milk and sugar, toast, fruit juice to drink. { Lunch:}Sandwiches of ham, salad or cheese; or roast meat, peas, potatoes, carrots, runner beans, cabbage, gravy and Yorkshire pudding. Dessert: Fruit tart and cream; gateau or strawberries and cream. Fizzy pop to drink. { Tea:}Sausages and chips; Kentucky fried chicken from the take-away or sandwiches of meat cheese or salad. Cakes or rice pudding to follow and milkshake to drink. { Supper:}Biscuits and hot chocolate. { Snacks:}Peanuts, fruit, crisps, ice cream and sweets.
